meta_description: Intuit Art Museum, located in Chicago’s West Town neighborhood, champions diverse self-taught artists—often working outside the mainstream or facing societal, economic, or geographic barriers—by collecting and exhibiting their work under the guiding principle that creativity is universal and the arts must be…
